needs: Oyin seeks to optimize laboratory processes by reducing turnaround times and improving accuracy through clear outcome definitions, early identification of unknowns, and scalable, data-driven solutions. They prioritize maintaining error budgets, embedding security in design, and establishing routines that turn firefighting into predictable operations while managing multimillion-dollar budgets.
personality: Oyin communicates with directness and transparency, relying on data and measurable milestones to drive collaboration. They value simplicity, clear accountability, and humane processes, favoring iterative experiments over debates. Their approach emphasizes readable documentation and aligning teams through concise updates and shared understanding of constraints and outcomes.
